context: COVID-19 pandemic drove massive home goods demand as people renovated during lockdowns. Wayfair saw significant growth in online furniture sales. Bed Bath & Beyond struggling, would eventually file bankruptcy.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Largest e-commerce platform with extensive furniture selection

competitors.name: IKEA
competitors.notes: Global furniture leader with 50+ country presence

competitors.name: Williams-Sonoma
competitors.notes: West Elm, Pottery Barn, 650 US stores
